DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study Agent Infusion Procedure Integer::1 Catheter Delay Reason Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text explanation for reason that study drug was held in an individual infusion catheter. [Manually-curated]

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Study Agent Infusion Procedure Integer::1 Catheter Delay
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research._An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect._A method of putting fluids, including drugs, into the bloodstream. Also called intravenous infusion._Time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time; the state of being slower or later.__A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::1_(KATH-i-ter) A flexible tube used to deliver fluids into or withdraw fluids from the body.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical trial.:An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.

Property.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part.::1:(KATH-i-ter) A flexible tube used to deliver fluids into or withdraw fluids from the body.:Delay; time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
(KATH-i-ter) A flexible tube used to deliver fluids into or withdraw fluids from the body.
Time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time; the state of being slower or later.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A free text field that describes a reason.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: a spoken or written statement that is made in reply to a question or request.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
